name: Racoon Cushion
description:
Racoons tend to have two sides, a lovely cutsie, cuddley, squishy side, and an evil, all-claws-&-all-teeth, nasty, vicious, gouge your eyes out side...

Well I can assure you, Malcome here is all cuddles and no bite.

He is made from felt with safety eyes and nose and loves a hug on the sofa or is more then happy to look over your baby on a shelf in the nursery.

name: Yeast Extract money jar
description:
Quintessentially English, a beautiful, big, Marmite money jar with a coin slot in the lid.

Keep the haters away from your pennies and make the lovers jealous of this iconic jar that would look fantabulous on the end of your bookcase. You could even keep your stash safe by keeping in your cupboard amongst the other preserves and condiments. Where ever you chose to keep it, at 10cm wide, 11.5cm tall and 6cm deep it will hold a good amount of coins, and even maybe some notes! 100% vegetarian.

name: Moustache Mugs
description:
The ever popular Moustache Mugs!

We have 3 styles of Moustaches, going from top left we have:

1) "The Working Man". What a wonderfully thick moustache you have! Be careful when you dunk a biscuit it doesn't get smooshed in the depths of your bristles. 
2) Next along is aptly named "The Gentleman". Can you resist pretending to twiddle your moustaches? Great to have at the office or home when enjoying a cuppa and taking a moment to ponder the meaning of life.
3) Last but by no means least is "The General". This is the Daddy of all moustaches. If only we could make it sway from side to side, as you wrinkle your nose, while you work out the next plan of attack. 

When ordering, please be sure to tell us if you are a left or right handed handle holder! We wouldn't want your neighbours missing out on a laugh because your moustache doesn't face outwards (If not otherwise stated you shall receive a right handed mug). Also available, orange or yellow paint for all you ginger and blonde people! 

SPECIAL FOR FATHER"S DAY, get a short personal message hand painted on the reverse side of your mug, (eg. "Happy Father's Day" or "love from your favourite child") FOR ABSOLUTELY FREE!
Just leave a note under your address on paypal or message us on facebook or to mail@peanutbutton.co.uk.


All mugs are hand-painted in a dishwasher safe 3D paint which gives your moustache a delightfully tactile feel.

Please bare in mind that these are hand-painted for you when you order so each will vary slightly from that pictured and take a few days to paint and dry. If you need it by a particular day let us know in the comments box when ordering. We aim to get it in the post to you within a week and will send via second class (2-3 day delivery) unless otherwise stated.

name: "Bruce & Sid" The Ginger Bread Men.
description:
This little guy on the left has come to be known as Bruce. He's a beefy boy, but is a big softy at heart and he has a lot of love to give. To the right of him is Sid, named after Peanut Button's resident cat, who was made around the same day.

Not much bigger than the palm of your hand, these cute little guys are so easy to pop in your bag or pocket they have been known to photo-bomb pictures and are perfect travel buddies or guardians of the office. They are partial to a little cuddle from time to time too!

You can order a customised gingerbread man, message me letting me know you are interested vis facebook, or to mail@peanutbutton.co.uk and you can ask for particular coloured buttons, or you can ask for a randomly generated guy, which will be made with just as much love, but will be a surprise for you to look forward to.

We don't advise any of our soft characters as toys for children due to small parts, but can use safety eyes if requested.

name: Hand painted Canvas
description:
These canvases are all hand painted with a tiny paint brush and a very steady hand. Unlike silk screened posters and boards often sold today, each single canvas has taken a minimum of 15 hours to make, and will take the same time again to produce a duplicate, meaning every canvas painted is a complete one of a kind, and will never been seen in any shop or gallery, or on a friends wall. Once it is yours, it is only yours!

What's more is you can get a canvas commissioned just for you!
Perfect for a special present on a birthday, anniversary or even as a wonderful addition to a new house! I can paint inspirational quotes, favourite lyrics, names of newly weds and their wedding date, or whatever else you can think of! Perfect for a newborn with name and birthday to have in the nursery, or how about a welcome message in the hall? The options are endless.

"Custom" price quoted if for 46cm x 38cm OR 55cm x 46cm sized canvases. You can pick up to 3 colours to be used, and the message should be between 2 and 12 words. 

If you want something a bit different (for example an alternative size, or to be painted on a pre-existing fabric you own) please message me with your idea and I will send you a new quote with no obligation to buy until you give me the go ahead.

These take a while to design and paint, so please order at least 3 weeks in advance to when you will need it, and I will try to send you updates as each step in the process is complete.

"Sunshine" canvas dimensions: 55cm x 46cm
"Dream" canvas dimensions: 46cm x 38cm
"Feet in Love" - SOLD

Due to computers showing slightly different shades of colours, colours may be slightly different to that pictured.

All one of a kind.
